BGP_VOQ_CHASSIS_ABSENT_LOCAL_ADDRESS_TES.desc: Load bgp voq chassis with no local address

BGP_VOQ_CHASSIS_INVALID_LOCAL_ADDRESS_AD.desc: Load ipv6 bgp voq chassis with ipv4 local address
eStr: local address and neighbor address family doesnt match

BGP_VOQ_CHASSIS_INVALID_ASN_TEST.desc: Load bgp voq chassis neighbor with asn number different than local asn
eStr: Voq chassis BGP neighbors should have same ASN as defined in device metadata
